taskDescription:
What is the sum of the first 101 terms of an arithmetic sequence with <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>a</mi>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>13</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{a_1} = 13</annotation></semantics></math>  and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>d</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>2.25</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">d = 2.25</annotation></semantics></math>?
